message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a generous offer considering I'm losing value with each round. Let's close this deal now.
Alice, considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a fair deal. You're losing value each round, so let's settle this now.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is now 58/42, I'm taking a significant hit from the inflation.  Accept this now before it gets worse for both of us.
Alice, I know you're losing value, but I'm not budging much. My new offer is 58/42 in my favor. You're running out of time, accept this before it gets even worse for you.
Bob, this is pointless. I'm offering a 50/50 split. Take it before the inflation eats away at this deal any further.  This is my final offer.
